item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (798 points | 206 comments)
2. DuoBook: Generate bilingual stories to learn any language (36 points | 19 comments)
3. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (298 points | 116 comments)
4. docker2exe: Convert a Docker image to an executable (33 points | 13 comments)
5. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (447 points | 416 comments)
6. Alignment is not free: How model upgrades can silence your confidence signals (48 points | 6 comments)
7. Claude's system prompt is over 24k tokens with tools (187 points | 64 comments)
8. VVVVVV Source Code (152 points | 22 comments)
9. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (358 points | 281 comments)
10. FTC rule on unfair or deceptive fees to take effect on May 12 (131 points | 86 comments)
11. (ab?)using Node module hooks to speed up development (9 points | discuss)
12. ACE-Step: A step towards music generation foundation model (66 points | 24 comments)
13. Bloat is still software's biggest vulnerability (2024) (99 points | 56 comments)
14. Old Timey Code and Old Timey Mono Fonts (102 points | 10 comments)
15. Scientists have found a way to 'tattoo' tardigrades (23 points | 6 comments)
16. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (551 points | 505 comments)
17. Show HN: Whippy Term - GUI terminal for embedded development (Linux and Windows) (48 points | 7 comments)
18. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (114 points | 64 comments)
19. India launches attack on 9 sites in Pakistan and Pakistani Jammu and Kashmir (253 points | 212 comments)
20. Sutton and Barto book implementation (50 points | 9 comments)
21. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (195 points | 102 comments)
22. Jury orders NSO to pay $167M for hacking WhatsApp users (115 points | 31 comments)
23. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (228 points | 74 comments)
24. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (93 points | 96 comments)
25. Continue (YC S23) is hiring software engineers in San Francisco ( | hide)
26. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (85 points | 35 comments)
27. EPA Plans to Shut Down the Energy Star Program (137 points | 97 comments)
28. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (98 points | 43 comments)
29. Show HN: Sheet Music in Smart Glasses (168 points | 21 comments)
30. New studies offer insight into Lyme disease’s treatment, lingering symptoms (177 points | 105 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
